local_intent: Perceive T-block and goal, align to block, set yaw to 0 deg, push block 0.2m to the right, then verify at goal.
assumptions: Push direction aligns with +X toward goal_region
Block is reachable on the table
coherence_with_global: Matches perceive→align→orient→push→verify sequence; uses raster scan fallbacks, yaw=0, push distance=0.2m, and goal verification as in GLOBAL_BT/DESCRIPTION.
